'''''There Is One Spectacle Grander Than the Sea, That Is the Sky''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Fontaine: Dance of the Dew-White Springs (II)]]''. To complete this achievement, the player must complete the {{Quest|An Eye for an Eye}}.

==Trivia==
* The achievement name is a direct reference of a line from the French historical novel ''{{w|Les Misérables}}'' by {{w|Victor Hugo}}.
